title: Ranked Queue issue

replies.body: Are you receiving any errors during this freeze?  It sounds like you might be experiencing a connection issue, and leaving you behind while others join champion select and then the match.  As Rineyy suggested, please go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  I recommend testing it out in custom games to prevent further lower priority queues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I'll try to do that, thanks for the information. I hope it will work

This is likely due to unstable connection to the servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
